Ali Chouaib

Software Engineer

Hey there!

I'm Ali Chouaib, a Computer Science & Engineering graduate from the University of Toledo. Here you can find info about me, my projects, interests, and other random stuff.

I’m a first-generation Lebanese-American with a lifelong passion for technology and exploration. My interest began early, sitting in front of my family’s IBM ThinkPad running Windows 95, wondering how everything worked. What started as childhood curiosity grew into a habit of building PCs for friends and family, and eventually into my path in computer science and engineering. Alongside technology, I’ve always been grounded by the things I love: philosophy/theology, cooking, athletics, and anything that gets me outdoors. Whether I’m working on a project, training, or trying new recipes in the kitchen, I approach everything with the same mindset: improve daily, embrace the challenges, and always keep striving towards knowledge.

Thank you for visiting my page! Feel free to reach out via text, email, or linkedin.
- Achouaib2868@gmail.com
- (419) 612-4568

Projects

Smart Scarecrow

Github

Computer-vision powered scarecrow that detects animals in the yard and triggers targeted deterrents to protect crops. Trained on a YOLOv8 model with a custom dataset.

Interactive Resume Chatbot

Visit

A personal resume chatbot that answers questions about my experience, projects, and background.

Healthy Hydration App

In-Progress

Cross-platform app for a hydration clinic that manages appointments, tracks visits, and integrates a personalized AI assistant.

Theology RAG Chatbot

In-Progress

A theology chatbot that answers questions about various religious texts using a custom RAG pipeline. As well as a custom data pipeline; Books, sermons, lectures and articles need to simply be added to the data folder where they are cleaned, processed, and sent to vector datastores where the bot can cleanly interact with the data.
